issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly conda-r fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9409](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9409). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Adding `decor` to Suggests means we need to add it to the conda env too (even though we don't use it in tests, etc. etc.)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9409?focusedCommentId=17157136) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
AFAICT this can be resolved during packaging in conda-forge

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9409?focusedCommentId=17157441) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
It would be better IMO to actually test the conda recipe, which is not what this job does.
